game.description: Retrieve a lost family heirloom from the ancient ruins of a long-abandoned castle.
game.objective: Recover the Golden Amulet and return it to its rightful owner.
game.quest_giver: Lady Isabella, the local lord's daughter
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a magical potion granting resistance to poison

tasks.description: Explore the entrance hall of the ancient castle and search for any clues or hidden dangers.
tasks.objective: Find a safe passage through the hall without triggering any deadly traps.

tasks.description: Locate the treasure chamber where the Golden Amulet is kept, navigating through treacherous corridors and avoiding rival treasure hunters.
tasks.objective: Reach the treasure chamber undetected and unscathed.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Golden Amulet from its pedestal, overcoming any magical wards or guardians protecting it.
tasks.objective: Obtain the Golden Amulet without triggering the ancient security systems.

game.title: The Lost Heirloom of Castle Eldrador
